articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 慢雾创始人余弦表示，MetaMask 支持 EIP-4361 将大幅减少钓鱼的可能性，由于“域名绑定验证 - 钱包必须检查域是否与实际签名请求源匹配”。https://twitter.com/evilcos/status/1639091781374717953

Cos(余弦)😶‍🌫️: 这个绝对重磅了...之前和朋友们聊了很久的 EIP-4361，小狐狸居然开始支持了，其他钱包还不快点跟上？
这个 EIP，我最关注的就是 Verification of domain binding 这部分：
- Wallets MUST check that the domain matches the actual signing request source.
这意味着，钓鱼们以后要头疼了...:)
articles.title: Re 慢雾创始人余弦表示，MetaMask 支持 EIP-4361 将大幅减少钓鱼的可能性，由于“域名绑定验证 - 钱包必须检查域是否与实际签名请求源匹配”。https://twitter.c...

articles.description: 老师在教室问三个学生，你们用什么可以填满整个房间。第1个学生找来稻草铺满地板，老师摇头。第2个学生拿根蜡烛点燃，屋子里充满光，老师还是摇头，因为影子没有被照到。第3个学生拿出KFC疯狂星期四炸鸡全家桶，香味充满房间，老师满意但还摇头。这时我拿出我100个钱包的ARB空投，焦虑充满了整个学校。

articles.author: 8848 社区（8848 Community）
articles.description:
RT Elkeson.eth⛩️(💙,🧡)
当压力大到快要崩溃的时候，不要跟别人讲，也不要觉得自己委屈，没人会心疼你，就像余华说的那样：在夜深人静的时候，把心掏出来，然后自己缝缝补补。要试着安静下来，去做自己该做的事。而不是让烦躁和焦虑毁掉你本就不多的热情和定力，心可以碎，手不能停，该干什么就干，这才是一个撸毛人的素养。

十万大军下江南

加密小师妹|Monica: 有关SUI的信息来自官方推特SPACE：
1.联合创始人兼CEO确认有10万+用户进入白名单，白名单可以以非常低的价格购买代币
2.白名单的成员包括参与测试Dapps，提供过有价值反馈，或者活跃于DC的成员，验证者等等
3.三测马上要开了，主网预计Q2。

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT Alex Gladstein 🌋 ⚡
Something that blew my mind when I first learned it:
Bitcoin's mining difficulty is updated every 2,016 blocks... as in, 6102 backwards
Also Satoshi chose as a birthday April 5, same day FDR issued 6102
Bitcoin was invented to stop government theft of citizen resources https://twitter.com/xlr8harder/status/1638896588553846784

xlr8harder: It's weird how we don't talk more about that time in 1933 when FDR signed executive order 6102 and forced US citizens to sell nearly all privately held gold to the government at $20/oz or face up to ten years in prison. https://t.co/VXTvbtCujr

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo;
- As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. 
- Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? 
If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. 
Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both… https://twitter.com/cryptocapo_/status/1637374540933103617

il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:
This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral.
Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520

Balaji: I will take that bet.
You buy 1 BTC.
I will send $1M USD.
This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k.
The term is 90 days.
All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
The Fed is in quite a pickle of their own making. 
They raised Fed Funds, likely making the outflow of bank deposits to money market funds even worse at a time when depositors are already skittish. 
This will make banks less likely to lend, freezing credit and slowing the… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1639255553649115139
